name: Infinity
about: A pop love song, with beautiful vocalizations.
lyrics:
Will you come here,
And stand by me?
Understanding me, look into my eyes (Eyes, baby!).
Stay with me
For some time.
Let's keep away the tender goodbyes (Goodbyes, baby!).

Came as a frightening lightning,
Left me brightening, brightening.
You probably were the best
Thing to happen to me (To me!).
Going nowhere else
Leaving this love enlightening
Because I still crave that
Lovely smile again.

Falling for divinity:
Is it called insanity?
Feeling the affinity
For my love approaches infinity!

Gravitation (The force)
Is abound
For beloved people cause attraction (O Love!).
What we give is
What we seek:
It is clearly love and care and attention (Attention, baby!).

Tell me, O darling!
Tell me, my love!
I miss you very much. Don't you know?
Alas! I love you.
How much I wish
That you understood the language of love (Love, baby!).

Come closer to me,
For my heart is waiting
Very eagerly for our conversation, love.
There is no explanation,
Just a proclamation:
I promise that I will love you forever (And ever, baby!).

Falling for divinity:
Is it called insanity?
Feeling the affinity
For my love approaches infinity!

Infinity! Your love approaches infinity.
Infinity! Your love approaches infinity.
Infinity! Your love approaches infinity.
Infinity! Your love approaches infinity.
My love approaches infinity.

You are my sunshine, sunshine:
Such a darling, darling,
That I wish to spend the
Rest of my life with you, love.
I will never hurt you,
I will never let you go.
We together will make
The world a better place.

Fallen for divinity,
Flourishing insanity,
From the strength of gravity
For my love approaches infinity!
